---
title: "Summary Tables"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r loadLibraries, echo = F}
library(summarytools)
library(knitr)
library(summarytools)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r load_objects = "asis"}
io <- readRDS("results/multi_city/io.rds")
# Assumes that multi_city_script.R has been run till 
cities <- c('accra','sao_paulo','delhi','bangalore')

```

```{r trip_tables = "asis"}

for(city in cities){
    td <- io[[city]]$dist
    print(kable(td, caption = paste("Distance table for ", city)))
    cat("\n")
}


for(city in cities){
    td <- io[[city]]$dur
    print(kable(td, caption = paste("Duration table for ", city)))
    cat("\n")
}
```


```{r pa="asis"}

for (city in cities){
  td <- io[[city]]$outcomes$mmets %>% dplyr::select(-c(participant_id))
  print(summarytools::dfSummary(td))
  cat("\n")
  
}

```
